newest.message:
# Release v4.0.0
## New Features - Conversion of EVEMon to ESI.
## Bug Fixes - Fixed a bug where time sync would lock up on startup.
## Contributors - Peter Han

release.message:
# Release v4.0.1
## Bug Fixes - Fix industry jobs not showing - Fix repeated skill training notifications - Change ESI base URL to new "esi.evetech.net" which may fix some trust failures
## Contributors - Peter Han - strannik-au - SpeedProg - SamuelHusky - wbSD

datafile.name: eve-blueprints-en-US.xml.gzip
datafile.message: Lifeblood 1.9 (1241240) blueprints data file by the EVEMon Development Team UPDATES TO THIS DATA FILE ARE OMITTED FOR THIS RELEASE NOT COMPATIBLE with EVEMon prior to version 2.2.0
